mapper.sql: id, goods_name, goods_title, goods_img, goods_detail, goods_price, goods_stock
mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.goods_name, g.goods_title, g.goods_img, g.goods_detail, g.goods_price, g.goods_stock, sg.seckill_price, sg.stock_count, sg.start_date, sg.end_date FROM t_goods g LEFT JOIN t_seckill_goods AS sg ON g.id = sg.goods_id

SELECT g.id, g.goods_name, g.goods_title, g.goods_img, g.goods_detail, g.goods_price, g.goods_stock, sg.goods_id, sg.seckill_price, sg.stock_count, sg.start_date, sg.end_date FROM t_goods g LEFT JOIN t_seckill_goods AS sg ON g.id = sg.goods_id WHERE g.id = #{goodsId}
SELECT tg.id,tg.goods_name,tg.goods_title,tg.goods_img,tg.goods_detail,tg.goods_price,tsg.seckill_price FROM t_goods tg JOIN t_seckill_goods tsg ON tg.id = tsg.goods_id LIMIT #{pages},#{pageSize}
SELECT id,goodsImg FROM t_goods_img WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId}
SELECT tg.id,tg.goods_name,tg.goods_title,tg.goods_img,tg.goods_detail,tg.goods_price,tsg.seckill_price FROM t_goods tg JOIN t_seckill_goods tsg ON tg.id = tsg.goods_id LIMIT #{pages},#{pageSize}
